title: WNB Golf Classic
text:
The WNB Golf Classic was a professional <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament in the <a href="United%20States">United States</a> on the <a href="Web.com%20Tour">Web.com Tour</a>. It was played annually at the Midland Country Club in <a href="Midland%2C%20Texas">Midland, Texas</a>, and the title sponsor was <a href="Western%20National%20Bank">Western National Bank</a>.
It debuted in <a href="1992%20Ben%20Hogan%20Tour">1992</a> as the <a href="1992%20Ben%20Hogan%20Tour">Ben Hogan</a> <a href="Permian%20Basin%20%28North%20America%29">Permian Basin</a> Open at the Club at Mission Dorado in <a href="Odessa%2C%20Texas">Odessa</a>. The purse was $150,000 and the winner's share of $30,000 went to <a href="Taylor%20Smith%20%28golfer%29">Taylor Smith</a> on August 30. The course is now part of the Odessa Country Club.
For its 23rd and final edition in <a href="2014%20Web.com%20Tour">2014</a>, the purse had quadrupled to $600,000 and <a href="Andrew%20Putnam">Andrew Putnam</a> took the winner's share of $108,000.
Winners.
Bolded golfers graduated to the PGA Tour via the Web.com Tour regular-season money list.
